title: Princess? Dragon Girl? Fire Away! - Novel Updates
tags: Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Perverted Protagonist
author: 弑神的梦
description:
Mister: Jiang Huo Er, what is your hobby?

Jiang Huo Er: Fire a cannon. (Slang for masturbate)

Mister: Jiang Huo Er, what are the things you like doing?

Jiang Huo Er: 1 shot every day.

Mister: Jiang Huo Er, what is your aspiration for the future?

Jiang Huo Er: Be friends with cannons. (Slang for f**k buddy)

Mister: Jiang Huo Er, what is your motto in life?

Jiang Huo Er: My cannon represents my justice!>
